body.p: Welcome to the contributor section of the project registry application on the Simal website. In this section you will find useful materials that are intended to help an interested party, like you, become involved with the improvement of the project registry application in the Simal project. Simal is open source software (using the Apache Software License V2). We are always looking for people to contribute, we need people with all sorts of skills including user testing, documentation writing, programming and marketing.
You'll probably want to start by looking at our quickstart document.
